title: SLEEP queries
extract: Sleep meaning that thread is do nothing. Time is too large beacuse anthor thread query,but not disconnect server, default wait_timeout=28800;so you can set values smaller,eg 10. ... This allows the connections to end if they remain in a sleep State for 3 minutes (or whatever you define).
extract_html: Sleep meaning that thread is do nothing. Time is too large beacuse anthor thread query,but not disconnect server, default wait_timeout=28800;so you can set values smaller,eg 10. ... This allows the connections to end if they remain in a sleep State for 3 minutes (or whatever you define).
